text: Method. Mentor: Prof. Arun Kumar | ME630 GitHub

text: Mentor: Prof. Pankaj Wahi | FEM – ME623 GitHub
bullets: o Developed FEM algorithms to solve 2D plane strain problems, focusing on stress -strain and strain -displacement relations .
o Applied numerical integration techniques, including two-point Gauss quadrature, for precise stiffness matrix and force vector evaluation .

o Applied TRIZ principles to innovate solutions, balancing increased battery capacity with reduced weight .

text: Mentor: Prof. Kamal K Kar | ME770
bullets: o Conducted a study to optimize material selection for knee implants, focusing on enhancing fatigue life .
o Analysed various materials to identify the most suitable option for improving implant durability .
o Failure Analysis & Simulation: Evaluated cotter joint integrity using failure theories and ANSYS simulations.
o Design Optimization: Enhanced cotter joint performance by optimizing design based on simulation results.
o Analysed and visualized customer data using Python to identify key factors influencing term deposit subscriptions.
o Developed and evaluated machine learning models to predict customer behaviour, improving subscription forecast accuracy .
o Applied feature engineering and correlation analysis to enhance model performance and guide targeted marketing strategies.
